basics.name: Mohammad Sarfraz Alam
basics.label: Full-Stack Developer and Open Source Contributor
basics.summary: Software Engineer with experience across startups and scale-ups, specializing in full-stack development, open-source contributions, and AI-powered platforms. Winner of Kavach 2023 Cybersecurity Hackathon. Passionate about building scalable systems and developer tools.

work.name: InfoEdge (Ambitionbox.com)
work.summary: Worked on product revamps for Interview Pages and Global Search. Implemented AI-powered Post Rephrase feature using Gemini with session-level rate-limiting.

work.name: Helium (gethelium.co)
work.summary: Worked on Helium Glide (No-Code Web Builder). Migrated app from CSR to ISR for improved performance.

work.name: Swiggy Instamart
work.summary: Enhanced the IM Retails App with NewRelic monitoring. Participated in UI revamp and migration to React Native.

work.name: CodeForGovTech (Beckn Protocol)
work.summary: Created a CLI tool for auto-code generation and built modular SDK and UI boilerplate for Beckn Protocol.

work.name: Google Summer of Code (ScoreLab)
work.summary: Revamped UI and architecture of Codelabz. Improved dev experience by optimizing dependency tree.

projects.name: Hardware Forensic Suite
projects.description: Winner of Kavach 2023 Hackathon. React + Electron + Solr-powered desktop app for disk, memory, and network forensics.

projects.name: JS Blueprints
projects.description: Visual scripting-based code builder inspired by Unreal Blueprints.

projects.name: blah.js
projects.description: Dynamic UI rendering library with its own compiler and parser.

projects.name: Go-Dis
projects.description: Redis implementation using Go and RESP protocol.

awards.title: Winner - Kavach 2023 Cyber Security Hackathon
awards.summary: Developed a Hardware Forensics Suite for cybercrime investigation.

volunteer.summary: Supported the development of Online Dispute Resolution (ODR) protocol.
